notTalked.text: Hey, newcomer, let's talk for a sec!!
Today you were sat in my spot, I don't want you to sit there again.
Starting tomorrow you will sit in the empty desk at the back.

talked.text: What at you looking at? go away, we've talked everything we needed.

choices.text: Sure, sorry, it won't happen again.
And who are you to tell me where I can or cannot sit?

submitReply.text: And by the way, in compensation, gimme that sandwich, i'm hungry.

takeSandwich.text: C'mon, get out of my sight.

downplayReply.text: That's it, it's just a spot but it's my spot.
So go and find another one.
(In a threatening tone) Or i'll have to help you find one.
And the last one I helped find a spot...well, he also found a bruise in his face.

defyReply.text: You are a smartass, aren't you?

notTalked.text: Sorry {{name}}, I did not see you.
I'm looking for an earring, I don't know where I could have lose it.

choices1.text: Have you looked in the hallway?
Perhaps you left it at home...

didntCheck.text: Can you go there? While I finish searching in the classroom...
You would do me a big favour.

cry.text: It can´t be, I was wearing them this morning.
Th- th- they are new, a gi... gift.

playerThoughts.text: (You noticed she is very worried and about to start crying)

beg.text: Please, *sniff* , *sniff* can you help me find them?

choices2.text: Yes (I will enjoy the recess and tell her I have not found anything).

illusionOfFreeChoice.text: Also here is my phone number, so we can text each other.

root.text: I should talk to her to see what happens.
